channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0294; 07:29AM; 607 W Century Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uLvdzc; Vermont Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a two-story four plex and crews contained the fire to the one unit of origin. A primary and secondary search are clear with no occupants found. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0294; 07:15AM; 607 W Century Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uLvdzc; Vermont Vista; Two story, garden style apartment building with moderate smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0068; 02:02AM; 819 E Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4acq2sm; #Venice; It took 28 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish flames contained mostly in the attack and walls of a two-story home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E263 E292 E59 E62 E63 E67 EM11 RA63 RA862 T5 T63 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0068; 01:43AM; 819 E Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4acq2sm; #Venice; Two-story single-family home with smoke showing from the roof. Offensive mode.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E263 E292 E59 E62 E63 E67 EM11 RA63 RA862 T5 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0011; 12:52AM; 12909 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/46NbFYc; #Sylmar; Firefighters found heavy fire inside of an auto body shop. Crews began in offensive mode, and eventually withdrew into defensive mode, due to the heavy fire load. It took 68 firefighters 35 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA89 RA891 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0011; 12:17AM; 12898 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T9vsy7; #Sylmar; One-story auto body shop with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA89 RA891 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Train vs Pedestrian; INC#1530; 06:05PM; 8900 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4a8Kv0Y; #Northridge; Sadly, one man (approximately 50 years old) was fatally struck by a train. Firefighter/Paramedics arrived to assess the man, only to find he was beyond medical help. The scene has been handed over to LAPD (Inc #3768) and the Medical Examiner. Nothing further.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 E28 E287 E296 E73 E8 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA93 T87 T96 UR88; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Outside Fire; INC#1480; 06:04PM; 19300 W Nordhoff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/486uSpa; #Northridge; Firefighters found a large homeless encampment on fire, with flames spreading to a quarter acre of grass and trees, and threatening a commercial building. Thirty-four firefighters deployed hose lines, held the flames to a quarter acre, and protected the nearby commercial building, extinguishing the flames in 25 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 E103 E104 E107 E273 E296 E70 RA104 RA903 T73 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Outside Fire; INC#1480; 05:39PM; 19300 W Nordhoff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/486uSpa; Northridge; Large outside (rubbish) fire, which spread to approximately one-quarter acre of vegetation, and threatening a commercial building.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 E104 E107 E273 E296 E70 RA104 RA903 T73 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1386; 05:02PM; 250 W Sepulveda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GyzyZc; #SanPedro; Firefighters found a vacant duplex with heavy fire showing from the rear unit. Crews began operating hose lines from the exterior, and knocked the flames back enough to continue the fight inside the structure (called a transitional attack), while other crews ascended ladders to the roof for vertical ventilation. Ultimately, it took 32 firefighters 16 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, before any fire reached the other unit in the duplex. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E238 E248 E285 E36 E48 EM13 RA112 RA848 T38 T48 T85; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
